title: NOEL Forgotten
description: NOEL Forgotten is a tense sci-fi romance about a woman with amnesia who adapts to her new life until those from her past return, forcing her on a journey to discover the truth about the organization that experimented on her as a child.Forgetting is easy. Remembering is painful. But revenge consumes.When a young woman wakes up with no memories of her past, she has no choice but to build a new life. Adopting the name Jane, she tries her best to fit in, but the emptiness in her soul tells her she was meant for more than a mundane existence.Desperate for a connection, she finds herself drawn to two handsome men. Her only obstacle is deciding between the nice and charming Julian and the dark and brooding Theo. That is, until memories resurface, leaving her with more questions than answers. What is NOEL, and what did they turn her into?***NOEL Forgotten contains mature content and is intended for readers 18+Author's note: CW can be found on the author's website.
author: Nicole Y Hanson
